text: Wilbur Haverfield Cramblet (July 10, 1892 – November 5, 1975) was an American football coach, mathematics professor, and college president. He served as the head football coach at Bethany College in Bethany, West Virginia in 1918. He served as the dean of students at Bethany from 1918 to 1920 and later as the college president from 1934 to 1952. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1892 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Heads of universities and colleges in the United States Category:Bethany Bison football coaches Category:Yale University alumni Category:People from Harrison County, Ohio
title: Wilbur H. Cramblet
